Description:
JASARA PMC, a joint venture between Public Investment Fund (PIF), Jacobs, and Saudi Aramco, is seeking a highly skilled Senior Design Manager to join our team. As the Senior Design Manager, you will be responsible for leading a team of designers and engineers in the development of innovative designs for social infrastructure programs in Saudi Arabia. This includes overseeing the design process, ensuring that designs meet client needs and adhere to project requirements, and managing project budgets and timelines. The successful candidate will have a strong background in civil engineering and proven leadership skills that will enable them to excel in a dynamic, challenging environment.At JASARA, we are committed to excellence in all that we do. As a Senior Design Manager, you will play a critical role in helping us deliver on the promise of Vision 2030 and bring visible change within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.Lead a team of designers and engineers in the development of innovative designs for social infrastructure programs in Saudi Arabia
Oversee the design process, ensuring that designs meet client needs and adhere to project requirements
Manage project budgets and timelines, ensuring that projects are delivered on time and within budget
Collaborate with clients, project managers, and other stakeholders to ensure that project goals are met
Provide technical expertise and guidance to team members
Develop and maintain project schedules, ensuring that all milestones are achieved in a timely manner
